Package io.digitalbits.sdk

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.digitalbits.sdk.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Main class used to connect to Frontier server.

      • submitTransactionXdr

        public SubmitTransactionResponse submitTransactionXdr​(java.lang.String transactionXdr)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Submits a base64 encoded transaction envelope to the network
        Parameters:
        transactionXdr - base64 encoded transaction envelope to submit to the network
        Returns:
        SubmitTransactionResponse
        Throws:
        SubmitTransactionTimeoutResponseException - When Frontier returns a Timeout or connection timeout occured.
        SubmitTransactionUnknownResponseException - When unknown Frontier response is returned.
        java.io.IOException

      • submitTransaction

        public SubmitTransactionResponse submitTransaction​(Transaction transaction,
                                                   boolean skipMemoRequiredCheck)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   AccountRequiresMemoException
        Submits a transaction to the network
        Parameters:
        transaction - transaction to submit to the network
        skipMemoRequiredCheck - set to true to skip memoRequiredCheck
        Returns:
        SubmitTransactionResponse
        Throws:
        SubmitTransactionTimeoutResponseException - When Frontier returns a Timeout or connection timeout occured.
        SubmitTransactionUnknownResponseException - When unknown Frontier response is returned.
        AccountRequiresMemoException - when a transaction is trying to submit an operation to an account which requires a memo.
        java.io.IOException

      • submitTransaction

        public SubmitTransactionResponse submitTransaction​(FeeBumpTransaction transaction,
                                                   boolean skipMemoRequiredCheck)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   AccountRequiresMemoException
        Submits a fee bump transaction to the network
        Parameters:
        transaction - transaction to submit to the network
        skipMemoRequiredCheck - set to true to skip memoRequiredCheck
        Returns:
        SubmitTransactionResponse
        Throws:
        SubmitTransactionTimeoutResponseException - When Frontier returns a Timeout or connection timeout occured.
        SubmitTransactionUnknownResponseException - When unknown Frontier response is returned.
        AccountRequiresMemoException - when a transaction is trying to submit an operation to an account which requires a memo.
        java.io.IOException

      • submitTransaction

        public SubmitTransactionResponse submitTransaction​(Transaction transaction)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   AccountRequiresMemoException
        Submits a transaction to the network This function will always check if the destination account requires a memo in the transaction. If you want to skip this check, use submitTransaction(Transaction, boolean).
        Parameters:
        transaction - transaction to submit to the network.
        Returns:
        SubmitTransactionResponse
        Throws:
        SubmitTransactionTimeoutResponseException - When Frontier returns a Timeout or connection timeout occured.
        SubmitTransactionUnknownResponseException - When unknown Frontier response is returned.
        AccountRequiresMemoException - when a transaction is trying to submit an operation to an account which requires a memo.
        java.io.IOException

      • submitTransaction

        public SubmitTransactionResponse submitTransaction​(FeeBumpTransaction transaction)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   AccountRequiresMemoException
        Submits a fee bump transaction to the network This function will always check if the destination account requires a memo in the transaction. If you want to skip this check, use submitTransaction(Transaction, boolean).
        Parameters:
        transaction - transaction to submit to the network.
        Returns:
        SubmitTransactionResponse
        Throws:
        SubmitTransactionTimeoutResponseException - When Frontier returns a Timeout or connection timeout occured.
        SubmitTransactionUnknownResponseException - When unknown Frontier response is returned.
        AccountRequiresMemoException - when a transaction is trying to submit an operation to an account which requires a memo.
        java.io.IOException
